scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an arched architectural setting. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue robe, is seated on the left, holding an open book. Facing her, on the right, is the Angel Gabriel, kneeling and presenting a scroll with the inscription "Ave gratia plena Dominus tecum". Behind them, a richly decorated ceiling with blue panels and gold stars is visible, along with arched windows. A figure, possibly God the Father, is depicted in the upper right corner, radiating light.
